entries.title_d: Polard Manfred is apparently running an illegal smuggling operation. You are to capture Manfred and turn him over to Imperial hands for questioning.
entries.title: Space Corellia: Capture Polard Manfred
entries.thanks_5: Today just hasn't been my day.
entries.thanks_4: They will be back. I cannot be allowed to live.
entries.thanks_3: I will tell you everything I know.
entries.thanks_2: Imperial prison or being blow to bits...
entries.thanks_1: Well thanks for my life...I guess.
entries.taunt_5: Don't think that you will get away so easily.
entries.taunt_4: I am going to take a great deal of pleasure in this.
entries.taunt_3: Sorry boss, but rules are rules.
entries.taunt_2: Polard, you will never get a chance to talk.
entries.taunt_1: You have betrayed us for the last time.
entries.target_disabled: Move in close and deliver the ultimatium.
entries.recovery_success: The vessel is away. It is heading towards one of our Star Destroyers who will pick up the criminal shortly.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close and if he does not agree to return peacefully, you will administer immediate justice on him.
entries.quest_location_d: Polard Manfred's ship is in the Corellia system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort Polard Manfred to Imperial hands. Keep the prisoner safe from any associates of his that might try to kill him rather then let him talk.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable Polard Manfred's vessel.
entries.panic_5: Blast it! They are not going to let me live.
entries.panic_4: You have written my death warrent.
entries.panic_3: Those pilots will do what ever it takes to make sure I don't talk.
entries.panic_2: They will never let me live. I know to much!
entries.panic_1: My own men are turning on me! Help!
entries.failed_escape: Polard got away. Hopefully we will get another chance at this.
entries.failed_destroy: We wanted to bring Polard to stand trial. Not kill him.
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: <%DI enemy escort fighters remaining. >
entries.complete: Polard Manfred is now in Imperial hands. Return to the Yavin 4 station and speak with the operation.
entries.capture_started: Sending warning to Polard Manfred to stand down and relinquish control of the vessel over to us.
entries.capture_phase_2: Okay, already. I will obey and go where you want me to.
entries.capture_phase_1: What are you doing? I am a private ship and you have no right.
entries.capture_complete: Polard Manfred's ship is now under our control. Escort him to a safe jump point.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have a lock on the smuggler. Capture and bring this man to justice.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Tracking Polard Manfred. Stand by to intercept.
entries.abort: I knew that Imperials were cowards.
